expresscarts.config.comment.maxMinecartS: Base maximum speed of Express Minecarts, in blocks per second.
expresscarts.config.comment.waterSpeedMu: Multiplier to the maximum Express Minecart speed when in water.
expresscarts.config.comment.brakingEnabl: Whether players may hold the backwards movement key to brake.
expresscarts.config.comment.brakeSlowdow: Amount by which an Express Minecart's velocity is scaled each tick its passenger holds the brakes.
expresscarts.config.comment.blockSpeedMu: Max speed multipliers when the rails are on certain blocks.
